name: Winter Wonderland Mini Project
description:
Hello! This is my game for the winter wonderland mini project. It's a free roam game designed to showcase the environment such as hill, swaying trees, snow, and some SFX. There is also a secret christmas tree area. Can you find it?

Controls:

*WASD to move

*Mouse to look around

*Space bar to jump

Assets Used

*Low Poly Winter Pack | 3D Characters | Unity Asset Store

*Paper Environment Pack vol. 1 | 3D Environments | Unity Asset Store
